item.title: Why Sheryl Leaves Hollywood At The End Of Woman Of The Hour
item.description: Anna Kendrick's Sheryl leaves Hollywood for good at the end of Woman of the Hour after a near-death encounter with The Dating Game Killer.

item.title: 11 Star Wars Characters In Canon & Legends Who'd Have Been A Better Sequel Trilogy Villain Than Palpatine
item.description: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker chose to make Emperor Palpatine the true villain of the sequels, even though there were many better options.

item.title: 10 Good Thriller Books Made Great By Their Twist Endings
item.description: Twist endings can often make or break thriller books, and these novelsâ€™ big reveals elevated them from good to great, ensuring their success.
